sentences.sContent: For toothpaste I used washed-up cuttlefish bone with wild fennel seeds, an oddity for a vegan.
sentences.sContent_eng: For toothpaste I used washed-up cuttlefish bone with wild fennel seeds, an oddity for a vegan.
sentences.sCn: 我使用洗过的墨鱼骨头做牙刷，野生茴香籽做牙膏（素食主义者的古怪用品）。

sentences.sContent: As an octopus, a squid, or a cuttlefish moves around a reef in the ocean, it instantly camouflages itself against the background.
sentences.sContent_eng: As an octopus, a squid, or a cuttlefish moves around a reef in the ocean, it instantly camouflages itself against the background.
sentences.sCn: 当海洋中的章鱼、鱿鱼、墨鱼游绕在暗礁处时，它们可以立即变身成暗礁的颜色来伪装自己。

sentences.sContent: Thiscombination of moulded pork fat and thick white cuttlefish takes some chewingbut, served in a good broth of spring onions, is delicious.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thiscombination of moulded pork fat and thick white cuttlefish takes some chewingbut, served in a good broth of spring onions, is delicious.
sentences.sCn: 这种用肥猪肉和厚厚的白色的墨鱼混合而成的丸子十分耐嚼，配以很好的小葱汤，非常地美味。

trans.tranOther: a sea creature with ten soft arms
